article_metadata.description: California and other states have been implementing illegal taxes on Medicaid managed care companies in order to secure more federal funding through the Medicaid program. The federal government has finally required those states to make the taxes compliant with federal law. California's revised tax scheme, written in large part by insurers, is extremely complicated. Congress should conduct aggressive oversight of these illegal taxes and state efforts to make them compliant with federal law.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
